General.Name: Shandong Yisheng Livestock & Poultry Breeding Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Yisheng Livestock & Poultry Breeding Co., Ltd. engages in the livestock and poultry business in China and internationally. It offers breeding pigs, cows, and chicken products, as well as offers environmental control equipment. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Yantai, China.
General.Address: No. 1, South Yisheng Road, Yantai, China, 265508

3.Name: Mr. Jie  Lin
3.Title: VP, CFO & Sec. of the Board of Directors
